message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this fantastic product that I believe will be of great value to you.  I'm offering it to you for $9,000.  Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I'm looking to keep my expenses within a certain budget. Could we discuss a price closer to $7,000?
Bob, I understand your budget concerns, but $7,000 is simply too low for me.  I'm willing to come down a bit, but I can't go lower than $8,500.  What do you think?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering my budget constraints, could we possibly settle on $8,000 for the product?
